content.text:
[@kas](@dBQlwh9Gtr3i5YMOGtIOKtGNVepeu+nyb6KGl1vtOcM=.ed25519)

I feel the same way!

[@nanomonkey](@+D0ku/LReK6kqd3PSrcVCfbLYbDtTmS4Bd21rqhpYNA=.ed25519) 

Oops, I meant to say "absolutely no *black bean* flavor", thanks.

I didn't know that about pizza stones, I'll need to read up and learn how to actually use it. I think Kathleen got it from her mom (?) and we've just been using it like a baking pan, but it's good to know that we should be leaving it in the oven.

The idea of leaving the oven on for an hour makes me feel a wasteful, but once we're deeper into fall/winter I'm sure I won't mind the extra heat. How do you take the pizza out of the oven without the stone? I'm hoping you don't tell me I need one of those big wooden paddle/spatula things...
